item.description:
Hi Everyone!

Kick-off your weekend in style at the "MFA First Fridays" Social event featuring fine art, live music, cash bar, tapas and the company of your group in the beautiful Koch Gallery!

MFA ~ meet in the Sharf Visitor Center, first floor. We've changed the time to 6:30 as it's better for many in the group.

Parking: Garage on Museum Road, next to museum. Or, take the Green Line.

Cost: Museum admission $20. Ticket can be used again within 10 days.
Admission to First Fridays and the Museum is free for Members. Members can admit a Guest for $5 so you could offer your guest discount to a group member. Tix can be purchased in the Sharf Visitor Center.

Hope to see you there! My mobile: 617.913.7890

Best regards,
Deb

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: MFA "First Fridays"
